title: Will new technology help in a long-distance relationship? - Quora

response.answer_text: I'm not going to click the link because i don’t want to see something gross but new technology wouldn't really help a relationship the only way I could see it working is webcam wise that's pretty much it. I don’t really think new technology would help in a relationship. apart from that though I don’t really see how tech can help a relationship.

Yes and with trust because without trust uhmm …it can never work fact and truth all you need is to believe whatever she(he) says and apply your wisdom and if you want to make your trust to base on technology be calm I will recommend you to check a link on my profile here and choose whatever help you want ……
